name: orphan bus
description:
Hello and welcome to the epic orphan bus simulator!

In this game you must help a bus full of blind orphans (yes, even the driver) and push it with your car
on a fast highway so they don't crash and die a horrible death! Because their bus is now *Out Of Control*

Controls:
pretty much just WASD

Credits:
Programming: mamuelsraz
Graphics and this text: Rufus
One rock next to the road, testing, and emotional support: riskosma and tondik420
Music: Stefan Kartenberg (http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/JeffSpeed68/61806)
